message: Fixed a bug which killed the disconnect detection. Added wifi state listener to trigger disconnects. Improved ability to detect failed message pushes

message: Red icon added to android to show DC. Swapped WakeupReceiver for AlarmReceiever to check status. Increased ping timer to reduce battery drain.
